automation_yaml:
id: 'office_wled_startup_sequence_with_living_room'
alias: 'Office WLED start-up sequence with Living Room'
description: "When Office WLED is turned on, then run a staged brightness sequence with Living Room and Office."
mode: single
trigger:
  - platform: state
    entity_id: light.wled
    from: 'off'
    to: 'on'
conditions: []
action:
  - delay: '00:00:02'
  - service: light.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id: light.living_room_2
    data:
      brightness_pct: 70
  - delay: '00:00:03'
  - service: light.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id: light.wled
    data:
      brightness_pct: 100
